p:
The compound of Formula (II) may be converted into another compound of Formula (II). Monohalogenated alkenedioates of Formula (IIb) ( e.g., X is Cl or F; his 1):
may be prepared by a process which involves elimination of hydrogen halide (HX 2) from vicinal dihalo alkanedioates of Formula (IIa) ( e.g., X 1 and X 2 are independently Cl or F; T is hydroxyl or halide; h is 1):
